Easy Hach

remove the back cover 3 screws (1 center top, 2 inside battery c=
ase)
Open case remove half of circuit board 
=A0=A0=A0=A0 three screws and =
one slip ring that holds on the tuning knob

With the battery compartment t=
o your right you will see a set of pins in the lower right of the circuit b=
oard bend the first pin (nearest the edge) inside row.

reassemble 



--- =
